file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 52-44-01-06 - REAR ELECTRONIC-COMPARTMENT DOOR - INSPECTION/CHECK

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL REAR ELECTRONIC-COMPARTMENT DOOR - INSPECTION/CHECK EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to do an inspection on the rear electronic-compartment door. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY REAR ELECTRONIC-COMPARTMENT ALL 52-44-01-200-801-A ♦ DOOR - DETAILED INSPECTION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 52-44-01 Page 1 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 52-44-01-200-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. REAR ELECTRONIC-COMPARTMENT DOOR - DETAILED INSPECTION A. General (1) This task gives the procedures for the inspection on the rear electronic-compartment door. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION REAR ELECTRONIC-COMPARTMENT DOOR - RE- AMM TASK 52-44-01-000-801-A/400 MOVAL REAR ELECTRONIC-COMPARTMENT DOOR - IN- AMM TASK 52-44-01-400-801-A/400 STALLATION C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 272 272DR Fuselage rear section I D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task In the maintenance shop I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A CAUTION: AFTER YOU REMOVE THE REAR ELECTRONIC-COMPARTMENT DOOR, PUT IT ON A SAFE SURFACE TO PREVENT SCRATCHES. (1) Remove the rear electronic-compartment door ( AMM TASK 52-44-01-000-801-A/400). J. Inspect (Detailed Inspection) Rear Electronic Compartment Door Mechanism (Figure 601) SUBTASK 220-002-A (1) With the mechanism in the locked position, examine the bellcrank, the rod, the lock pin, and the support (Figure 601). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 200-801-A/600 52-44-01 Page 2 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (2) After you examine the components, actuate the handle and move the mechanism to the unlocked position and examine the parts of the lock pin which were inside the support. K. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Install the rear electronic-compartment door ( AMM TASK 52-44-01-400-801-A/400). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 200-801-A/600 52-44-01 Page 3 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
